content: The Great Kiwi Massacre occurred on July 21, 2021, marking the Zebra invasion of Kiwia.
Operation Razzle Dazzle was the Zebra code name for The Great Kiwi Massacre.
Despite using a codename, the Zebras had trouble keeping their plans secret, on account of their bright stripes.
The involvement of the Mustangs was what ultimately allowed the Zebra Forces to breach Kiwian defenses.
Doggiestan remains rich in calcium deposits to this day.
